net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.graphics.Animation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A class which represents a single Sprite based animation.
    Since:
    Apr 24, 2015, 11:50:16 PM
    Author:
    Christian Bryce Alexander

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Animation.Style
      Lists four styles of animation, all of which alter the order of appearance of the frames in the Animation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Animation(Sprite[] frames, long delay)
      Creates an Animation with the default step and style.
      Animation(Sprite[] frames, long delay, Animation.Style style)
      Creates an Animation with the default step of 1.
      Animation(Sprite[] frames, long delay, int step)
      Creates an Animation with the default style, Animation.Style.LOOP.
      Animation(Sprite[] frames, long delay, int step, Animation.Style style)
      Creates a standard Animation.

      Sets the index of this Animation.

      Sets the Animation to stop running, and sets the current frame to the beginning.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animation

        public Animation(Sprite[] frames,
                 long delay,
                 int step,
                 Animation.Style style)
        Creates a standard Animation.
        Parameters:
        frames - The animation frames
        delay - The amount of milliseconds betwen frames
        step - The amount of frames to jump each update
        style - The style of the animation

      • Animation

        public Animation(Sprite[] frames,
                 long delay,
                 int step)
        Creates an Animation with the default style, Animation.Style.LOOP.
        Parameters:
        frames - The animation frames
        delay - The amount of milliseconds betwen frames
        step - The amount of frames to jump each update

      • Animation

        public Animation(Sprite[] frames,
                 long delay,
                 Animation.Style style)
        Creates an Animation with the default step of 1.
        Parameters:
        frames - The animation frames
        delay - The amount of milliseconds betwen frames
        style - The visual style of the Animation

      • Animation

        delay - The amount of milliseconds betwen frames

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Steps the animation if the amount of milliseconds since last update has exceeded the specified delay.

        Sets the next frame based on the specified animation Animation.Style.

        Reverses the direction of this Animation, if applicable.

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Returns:
        true if it is playing, false otherwise

      • isDone

        public boolean isDone()
        Returns:
        true if this Animation is of style Animation.Style.ONCE, and it is on the first or last frame, false otherwise
